Alvin ChowLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 11 Jul 2018We don't or I should say rarely. We are bottom-up investors mainly. Graham also didn't say you need to look at the economy. He merely used stock yields vs bond yields to decide to weight in which asset class.0 comments0
